author: Willem Marx and Mac William Bishop
title: Detectives aid coronavirus tracking in Iceland's fight to contain spread
description: Iceland had nearly 10,000 of its 364,000 citizens under strict quarantine orders as of Friday morning in a unique effort to minimize the impact of COVID-19.
content:
REYKJAVIK, Iceland Gestur Palmason has spent the past few weeks running down leads and profiling suspects, but those whom the veteran police detective is chasing arent criminals, they are coronavirus carriers.
The 40-year-old with a shaved head is part of a … [+8681 chars]
